医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
高剂量流感疫苗可以降低心血管疾病风险吗？高剂量流感疫苗是否与减少脑瘫事件的益处相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Does-a-high-dose-influenza-vaccine-reduce-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Does-a-high-dose-influenza-vaccine-reduce-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c0feb46-3106-4409-ad8e-f70f382e63c8 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 06:55:00 -0400 Does a high-dose influenza vaccine reduce cardiovascular disease risk?
乳腺癌诊断后 6 至 18 个月对癌症复发的恐惧水平轨迹研究人员检查了乳腺癌（BC）患者对癌症复发（FCR）恐惧的预测因素及其轨迹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Trajectory-of-fear-of-cancer-recurrence-levels-six-to-18-months-post-breast-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Trajectory-of-fear-of-cancer-recurrence-levels-six-to-18-months-post-breast-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2178ffd3-bd10-4789-a589-4b3a7b952201 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 06:31:00 -0400 Trajectory of fear of cancer recurrence levels six to 18 months post-breast cancer diagnosis
LabGenius 与赛诺菲的合作伙伴关系在 AI 抗体发现平台上取得了积极成果今天，利用人工智能和机器学习进行抗体发现的先驱 LabGenius 在与赛诺菲进行多年合作后，发布了其抗体发现平台的新数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/LabGenius-Sanofi-partnership-yields-positive-results-from-AI-antibody-discovery-platform.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/LabGenius-Sanofi-partnership-yields-positive-results-from-AI-antibody-discovery-platform.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae0e666d-ef62-40b2-a793-5bd544b4a1ac Tue, 19 Sep 2023 06:27:00 -0400 LabGenius & Sanofi partnership yields positive results from AI antibody discovery platform
Astrea Bioseparations 扩大制造和仓储能力，以满足北美对其色谱解决方案不断增长的需求Astrea Bioseparations（“Astrea Bio”）是一家领先的高质量生物分离和纯化技术提供商，通过更安全、更有效地生产治疗药物来帮助改善患者的治疗效果，该公司宣布扩大其在美国的制造和仓储能力。产能的增加反映出北美市场对公司色谱解决方案的需求不断增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Astrea-Bioseparations-expands-manufacturing-and-warehousing-capacity-to-support-having-demand-for-its-chromatography-solutions-in-North-美国.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Astrea-Bioseparations-expands-manufacturing-and-warehousing-capacity-to-support-having-demand-for-its-chromatography-solutions-in-North- America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc28f36b-37b1-4d29-bd63-afd58ba9dc83 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 06:14:00 -0400 Astrea Bioseparations expands manufacturing and warehousing capacity to support growing demand for its chromatography solutions in North America
早期自闭症诊断突破：机器学习利用真实和人造面孔上的眼球运动一种通过检查眼球运动来检测儿童自闭症谱系障碍 (ASD) 的创新技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Early-autism-diagnosis-breakthrough-machine-learning-uses-eye-movements-on-real-and-artificial-faces.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Early-autism-diagnosis-breakthrough-machine-learning-uses-eye-movements-on-real-and-artificial-faces.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25fc5797-8340-4eec-b7db-e9aca63207b4 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 05:04:00 -0400 Early autism diagnosis breakthrough: machine learning uses eye movements on real and artificial faces
关于 JADA®System（一种控制产后出血 (PPH) 的医疗设备）的第一项真实世界观察性研究，发表在 ACOG 的《妇产科》上Organon 今天宣布，美国妇产科学院 (ACOG) 的同行评审期刊 Obstetrics & Gynecology 发表了 RUBY 研究的结果，该研究达到了成功治疗异常产后子宫出血和产后出血的主要有效性结果JADA® 系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/First-real-world-observational-study-of-the-JADAc2aeSystem-a-medical-device-to-control-产后出血-(PPH)-发表于-ACOGe28099s-Obstetrics-Gynecology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/First-real-world-observational-study-of-the-JADAc2aeSystem-a-medical-device-to-control-产后出血-(PPH)-发表于-ACOGe28099s-Obstetrics-Gynecology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5421feab-ee89-49e2-a785-4e7553c6847c Tue, 19 Sep 2023 04:30:00 -0400 First real-world observational study of the JADA®System, a medical device to control postpartum hemorrhage (PPH), published in ACOG’s Obstetrics & Gynecology
新的治疗方法可有效治疗最具侵袭性的前列腺癌芝加哥大学医学综合癌症中心的研究人员为一种新的治疗方法建立了“概念验证”，该方法能够有效治疗最具侵袭性的前列腺癌。该治疗在晚期前列腺癌小鼠模型中显示出完全的肿瘤控制和长期存活且无副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/New-treatment-approach- effectively-treats-the-most-aggressive-forms-of-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/New-treatment-approach- effectively-treats-the-most-aggressive-forms-of-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39da7959-1e6e-4e83-8123-f4923819e4d0 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 03:54:07 -0400 New treatment approach effectively treats the most aggressive forms of prostate cancer
沃特世推出新的直接解决方案，进一步简化生物药品和细胞培养基的分析沃特世公司宣布推出新的生物工艺直接解决方案，旨在进一步简化生物样品的制备和分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Waters-launches-new-walk-up-solutions-that-further-simplify-the-analysis-of-biologic-drug-product-and-cell-文化媒体.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Waters-launches-new-walk-up-solutions-that-further-simplify-the-analysis-of-biologic-drug-product-and-cell-文化媒体.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9dda28c-bf95-4259-b2dc-a1b26cbdb639 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 03:37:00 -0400 Waters launches new walk-up solutions that further simplify the analysis of biologic drug product and cell culture media
积极反馈有助于增加医护人员之间的相互欣赏医疗保健组织在审查护理服务机会并向员工提供反馈时，通常会关注出了什么问题，但一项新的研究表明，扭转这种观点可能有助于组织通过了解什么是正确的来改善其工作文化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Positivefeedback-can-help-increase-mutual-appreciation-among-healthcare-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Positivefeedback-can-help-increase-mutual-appreciation-among-healthcare-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c477b6c-1550-43e7-825b-557c82ce3b52 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 03:35:51 -0400 Positivefeedback can help increase mutual appreciation among healthcare workers
AR耳机被证明是改善帕金森病患者姿势的有效数字工具根据克利夫兰诊所最近的一项试验，增强现实耳机是一种有效的数字工具，可以改善帕金森病患者的姿势和步态。研究结果发表在《神经康复和神经修复》杂志上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/AR-headset-proven- effective-digital-tool-for-improving-posture-in-people-with-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/AR-headset-proven- effective-digital-tool-for-improving-posture-in-people-with-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57af24d8-4222-4eee-bd7f-c57f1e98fef7 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 03:01:47 -0400 AR headset proven effective digital tool for improving posture in people with Parkinson’s disease
